articles.title: Europe entering 'plausible endgame' to COVID-19 pandemic, World Health Organisation says - 9News
articles.description: The director of the World Health Organisation's Europe office said the continent is now entering a "plausible endgame" to the pandemic and that the number of coronavirus deaths is starting to plateau.
